text: Mayo Simon is an American screenwriter, author and playwright. He is the father of the author Francesca Simon and biologist-X-Files science advisor Anne Simon. ==Select filmography== *Man from Atlantis (1977) (pilot episode) *Futureworld (1976) *Phase IV (1974) (original screenplay) *Marooned (1969) (screenplay) *Why Man Creates (1968) (conceived and written with Saul Bass) *I Could Go On Singing (1963) (screenplay) ==Select plays== *Happiness - Lincoln Center *L.A.
